sentences.sContent: In the West, job interviews are highly formalized and systematic.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the West, job interviews are highly formalized and systematic.
sentences.sCn: 在西方，工作面试是非常正式和系统化的。

sentences.sContent: Though once considered outside the mainstream of scientific inquiry, astrobiology has a formalized field of study.
sentences.sContent_eng: Though once considered outside the mainstream of scientific inquiry, astrobiology has a formalized field of study.
sentences.sCn: 虽然一度被视为非主流的科学问题， ， 但天体生物学已成为正式的研究领域。

sentences.sContent: Concept lattice ( galois lattice ) is a formalized tool for concept discovery from data , and has been widely used in many scientific applications.
sentences.sContent_eng: Concept lattice ( galois lattice ) is a formalized tool for concept discovery from data , and has been widely used in many scientific applications.
sentences.sCn: 概念格模型作为一种用于数据分析的形式化的工具，已经在众多的领域中获得了广泛的应用。

remMethod.val: 来自formalize(v. 使形式化， 使正式)
